```{r}
effects = c(-2.76E-03, 6.16E-03, 6.19E-03, 1.39E-03, 4.23E-04, 6.24E-04, -9.78E-03, -8.99E-03, -6.35E-03, -1.56E-03, -1.01E-02, -6.18E-03, -1.59E-02, -3.74E-03, -1.26E-02, -8.79E-03, -8.37E-03, -5.30E-03, -1.09E-02, -1.50E-02, -4.38E-03, -1.02E-02)
days = c(-7:14)

plot(days, effects, main='Effect of COVID-19 Stay-at-Home Orders on Happiness', xlab='Days Since Stay-at-Home Order Enforcement', ylab='Estimated Effect', type='o')
abline(0, 0)
text(days, effects, labels=effects, cex=0.7, pos=c(1, 1, 4, 3, 1, 3, 1, 1, 3, 3, 1, 3, 2, 3, 1, 1, 3, 3, 2, 1, 3, 1))
```
